DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two contact lens care solution symptomatic wearer silicone hydrogel contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Alcon Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution Versus Renu Fresh Multi-Purpose Solution Symptomatic Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic silicone hydrogel contact lens wearer wear lens daily wear ( i.e. , disinfect lenses every night ) . Vision correctable 20/30 good contact lens . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Sensitivity multipurpose solution . Use topical ocular OTC prescribe topical ocular medication . History ( 6 month ) current ocular infection ocular inflammatory event . Ocular surgery within past year . Medical condition use medication cause ocular side effect . Participation investigational study within past 30 day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
